title: Finally set up a Stream! Watch me try climbing to Masters with Mordekaiser ADC!

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem.

body:
So, with Uni having ended for the Summer I decided to finally set up a stream and just spend these scorching hot days doing what I do best.

~~Complaining about~~ Playing Mordekaiser!

And what better way than to enjoy doing so than to Stream the whole ordeal?

First day of Streaming will be starting tomorrow at 14:00 UTC
Which means 6 hours earlier for you folks on NA! Don't worry though, I won't just stream one game or so, might aim for Diamond 3!

Joining me will be my best bud Rubick, so you can finally see him in his natural habitat (trust me, he's a really swell guy once you get to know him)

Anyways, just wanted to share that info, feel free to check out the Stream once it's life!
Even if it's just to chat, be it about League related topics or just other kinds of Banter!

-MM

replies.body: http://i.imgur.com/NnoGhN1.gif?noredirect

{{champion:53}} Fired up, and ready to serve


on a serious note i wanted to say few things:

i will be playing during this climbing some different kind of supports, mostly {{champion:53}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:117}}  depending on match ups

i will do my best to stay somewhat agressive even with {{champion:37}}  to make it entertaining and enjoyable :^) 

Downside of this stream:
-one of the worst english ever
-french accent
-no tilting for you to laugh

But but but....

I want that Malicious Metal ;)
Knew it! You may not be native to French but you speak it like the best of them!

http://www.cultofmac.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2010/05/phoenix-wright-objection.jpg

not like the best, they're way ahead of me when it comes to speaking a terrible english
I can sympathize on that one...

I'm totally gonna keep Twitch chat-ing all over your chat buddy.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/192357592876449793/320256895581683723/Chat.PNG

Post made 1 hour ago, stream offline. 

Ty rubyx Kaiser
Can low ELO people insult your gameplay, just for fun, not really meaning it?

No, my gameplay is perfect and infallible, there's literally not a single thing I'll ever mess up when playing Morde!

~~Jk, of course ya can~~
Already one of my favourite streamers
followed
Boom, followed.
SIGN ME THE FUCK UP!
Well, this is an interesting turn of events. I will definitely tune in if I can catch it.

Na isn't ready for ADC Morde in EUW
Twitch stream can't block the sheer rawness Of ADC Morde

gonna give this a follow. i think its so cool you finally got a stream going, next stop the donation train

**woo woo**
